content:
That's wonderful! I'm sure your sister will be thrilled to receive such a thoughtful and personal gift. It's great that you're willing to share your creativity with her, and I'm sure she'll appreciate the love and effort you put into creating the ceramic sculpture.

Remember, the act of giving is often more valuable than the physical gift itself. Your sister will likely cherish the sculpture not only because of its beauty but also because it comes from you and represents your connection with her.

Don't forget to include a heartfelt note or message with the gift, expressing your love and thoughtfulness. It'll make the gift even more special and personal.

I'm glad I could help, and I hope your sister has a wonderful birthday!
